com.kyron.rmi

Class RMIServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • com.kyron.rmi.RMIServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBServerInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIServer
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements DBServerInterface
    Since we need to make this a RMI Remote object we have to extend it from UnicastRemoteObject and so we cannot extend it from DBServer. Instead, we will instantiate DBServer object and delegate all the calls to it. In affect, it is exactly same as DBServer except that it is a remote class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
